item.title: c. File System Examination
item.description: We will now take a look at our file system, it's structure and content. item.title: d. Lazy File Loading
item.description: This section is largely inspired (or shamelessly stolen) the content of the Amazon FSx for Lustre Workshop hosted here. If interested to dive deeper we encourage your to check it out. As seen in the previous section, files content is not retrieved yet on the filesystem. But nothing prevents you to access your files as you would do with any other POSIX compliant file system. When accessing the file the actual content will be retrieved.
